context.p: To install the Eucalyptus Console from packages on Centos and RHEL 5.8:

step.cmd: Configure the EPEL repository by editing the file /etc/yum.repos.d/epel.repo:

info.codeblock: [epel] name=Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux - $basearch baseurl=http://mirror.eucalyptus/epel/$releasever/$basearch enabled=1 gpgcheck=0

step.cmd: Create a new file mamed /etc/yum.repos.d/eucalyptus-ui.repo and add the following content (please note that the mirrorlist entry should be on one contiguous line):

info.codeblock: [eucalyptus-ui] name = Eucalyptus UI mirrorlist = http://packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/api/1/genrepo/?distro=centos &releasever=5&arch=x86_64 &url=git://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus-ui.git &ref=master enabled = 1 gpgcheck = 0

taskbody.postreq: You are now ready to configure the Eucalyptus Console.
